document_data.mainbody:
he North Jotunhammer Mountains were a prominent mountain range located on the island of Norland within the Moonshae Isles.
The mountains dominated much of central and northern Norland. They stretched from central Norland near the North Cape up the islands western coast to end at the north end of the island, covering a distance of over . The mountains formed the entire western edge of the Frostfenn. They were separated from the South Jotunhammer Mountains by several miles of open terrain.
